header.title: The best Fence & Concrete installation company in Richmond
bullets: Fast, responsive and friendly customer service from start to finish.
FREE custom fence quotes that you can create and review online!
Transparent pricing so you know exactly what you’re getting.
Quality Fence & Concrete craftsmanship delivered by skilled contractors.

Yelp.title: I'm so pleased with the sales consultant. It was all done virtually via phone video. Very helpful and took the time to explain, step by step the whole process. Mark answered all my questions and went out of his way to develop designs that were not available in their portfolio. We'll definitely go with Ergeon to install our new fence.
Yelp.name: Jose S.
Yelp.description: Very helpful and they took the time to explain, step by step the whole process

Google.title: WOW! I have been talking about redoing our fence since we moved in! We had a series of conversations and video chats of what I wanted. Our rep was fantastic representation of stellar service. No matter how indecisive I was she never seemed annoyed or short, she was patient, encouraging and kind. Sam was my first in person visit! LOVED him, appreciated that he gave his opinion. Day of project! Guys were FAST and friendly! Thank you Ergeon for making this our first big home purchase!
Google.name: Stacy M.
Google.description: The guys were FAST and friendly! Thank you Ergeon for making this our first big home purchase!

regulations.title: Permits & Regulations
regulations.description: See the undefined Permits & Regulations for undefined

faq.front-yard: 4 feet, 6 feet (4 feet solid + 2 feet minimum 50% open top)
faq.side-yard: 6 feet, 8 feet only applicable if both abutting residential structures have at least 10-foot side yard setbacks, or if a residential parcel abuts a commercial or industrial use
faq.rear-max-height:
6 feet , 8 feet only applicable only when rear yard is abutting an
interior side yard
faq.setback: no setbacks specific to fence. A fence located on a property line shall be considered as being within the yard adjacent to that property line. The fence owner shall be responsible for properly locating all property lines before construction of any fence)
faq.corner-lot-rules: 3.5 Max height on 25 feet Visibility Triangle Area measured from property lines

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.
